title: Prettier config with RDN plugin options

useExplicitMapKeyword.description: Keep the explicit Map keyword on non-empty maps (e.g. Map{ k => v }). When false, non-empty maps are formatted as implicit ({ k => v }).

useExplicitSetKeyword.description: Keep the explicit Set keyword on non-empty sets (e.g. Set{ 1, 2 }). When false, non-empty sets are formatted as implicit ({ 1, 2 }).

sortKeys.description: Sort object keys alphabetically (ascending). Applies recursively to all nested objects.
